name: Invisible Maze (TransGame668)
description:
Just rolling the ball and find colorfull cube to win. Why not try to memorize the maze and slowly playing it. There a 5 track in this game (Simple, Easy, Medium, Hard and, Harder), also an hidden box collider that make the maze is visible, If you confuse press the Restart button (Showing in top right corner)

Controls: WASD for the Movement.

Music by: freesound.org
